      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addTask(Task task)
      Submits a task into the incoming task queue
      static boolean checkActivity()
      Checks and returns the conditions for the activity of all tasks
      void checkNewTasks()
      Loops through the incoming tasks and puts them into the executory cycle or the idle task list
      static boolean checkTaskDate(java.util.Date date)
      Mainly for testing reasons, compares dates with current time and decides whether this time has passed or is yet to be executed.
      void executeTasks()
      Executes all of the scheduled tasks to be executed in the executoryCycle list
      static TaskController getSingleton()
      Gets the singleton instance
      void sortTasks()
      Loops through the idle task list and checks if they are due to be inputted into the executoryCycle or delayed
